body:
### 2DScrollViewAndroid
2DScrollView Android is for Horizontal as well as vertical Scrolling, I searched alot and found some useful answers, so created a project, please contribute if you fell this need changes.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
